extendedInfo.description: Game info:Nature's Jewel is a match-3 game similar to the likes of Bejeweled game.So simple, try to match 3 or more jewel to get your score but extremely addictive gameplay. There's 3 mode with 3 funny gameplay diffirent (Classic, Time race & Quest).â¢Classic mode: with a basic gameplay, you'll try to fill up progress bar to complete a level.â¢Time race: you must match the jewels quickly before the progress bar is empty, you can control you time depend on your skill and try to get highness-score that you can.â¢Quest mode: finish your task to pass a level !Feature:â¢Auto-save whenever you quit game.â¢Move and score even when another jewels is scoring.â¢3 awesome power-ups to get big score.â¢Pretty graphic and impressed sound effect.â¢Load game very fast.

reviews.title: To all those people....
reviews.comment: Yeah it loads feint but to get it off you only press the phones BACK button. Its a great game and very fun :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s beautiful ...
reviews.comment: I like the decorations, the music , the jewels and l like playing it but you can\'t access to the quest mode unless you buy it so I would only give it four stars
reviews.author: Jeanine Kyla De Castro

reviews.title: Annoyed
reviews.comment: The game is great until you get to Level 14. There is no end to it. I was stuck on it for over an hour until I gave up and let the timer run out. Uninstalled!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Instant favourite
reviews.comment: The graphics and music are very beautiful. I would like to buy the full version, but it says it\'s incompatible?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Relaxed
reviews.comment: Love this game.  Feint is not required and the graphics are pleasing to the eye.  Played many jewel games and this one is the best by far for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun & mellow
reviews.comment: \"Mellow\" having two meanings here: 1) gameplay is chill. 2) I appreciate that it has only one permission. It\'s so not cool when a game wants access to your contacts, location, bra size, etc. ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s a rip off. As soon as I go to play, it goes to some loading screen with feint and it locks up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good
